channel.title: A collection of the most exquisite foods... because I live to eat.
channel.description: A collection of the most exquisite foods... because I live to eat.

item.title: Want Some of This Texas Barbecue? Get in Line. For 3 Hours or Longer.
item.description:
Want Some of This Texas Barbecue? Get in Line. For 3 Hours or Longer.

AUSTIN, Tex. - At Franklin Barbecue, people pull up at dawn or shortly thereafter and spend their breakfast hours waiting for lunch. Rain or shine, six days a week, hundreds of men, women and children wait three to five hours or longer to eat some of the most celebrated smoked beef brisket in America.

item.title: Safeguarding Pesto
item.description:
Safeguarding Pesto

How one man got the world making pesto by hand
